RubyCamp Belgium 2015

A code retreat during a whole weekend in Belgium with fellow Rubyists.
A good time to share, pair, learn, build, and code.

The Concept

It's unformal and community based. You want to give a workshop or a talk? Do it. You want to build a project with others? Do it. This is also a good time for uncoding activities (like sports!) and for knowing each other better. It comes from the original RailsCamp.

Code Of Conduct

We are dedicated to provide a harassment-free camp for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment and unappropriate behavior. We follow the same Code of Conduct than Arrrrcamp.

The package

The price of 100â‚¬ includes 2 nights, food, soft-drinks and light beers, and a membership to the new association Ruby Belgium.

Organizers

The event is organized by Christophe and Yannick.

When and Where (to be confirmed!)

It should be in Tilff (check the map below) during the last weekend of August 2015. From Friday evening the 28th August to Sunday afternoon the 30th August.

Register

To register, just send a message to the organizers. They will confirm you the reservation and send you the payment details.

Register

Contact

You can directly ping the organizers on twitter, or send them an email to the following address:
